targets.query:
from(bucket: "spot-spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "price_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "spot-spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "spread_profit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "spot_spread")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["symbol"] == "${symbol}" or "${symbol}" == "ALL")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ex_buy"] =~ /^${ex_buy:pipe}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ex_sell"] =~ /^${ex_sell:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "spot-spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "spread_profit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "profit_margin_pct")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["symbol"] == "${symbol}" or "${symbol}" == "ALL")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ex_buy"] =~ /^${ex_buy:pipe}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["ex_sell"] =~ /^${ex_sell:pipe}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: 数据来源于后端 SpreadArbitrageStatsTask，已扣除买卖双方 Maker/Taker 手续费。公式：profit_margin_pct = rawPct - feeSell - feeBuy。
panels.title: 交易所组合利润率（已扣费）%

panels.description: 买一价(bid)来自 ex_buy，卖一价(ask)来自 ex_sell。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "spot-spread")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "spread_profit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bid" or r["_field"] == "ask")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["_field"] == "bid" and r["ex_buy"] == "binance") or (r["_field"] == "ask" and r["ex_sell"] == "binance"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["symbol"] == "${symbol}" or "${symbol}" == "ALL")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
